summary: Provides functionality to generate a lightweight Bazel rc file (conan_bzl.rc) that encodes Conan configuration attributes and user‑defined platform constraints, using a Jinja2 template and persisting the result to disk.
business_intent: Facilitate the integration of Conan package management into Bazel builds by automatically producing the necessary rc configuration, thereby simplifying cross‑compilation and platform selection without requiring a full Bazel toolchain definition.
